A: Who angered pig? (a) Tortoise (b) Tortoise's wife (c) Wife
Whose wife is in the story? (a) Pig's wife (b) Tortoise's wife (c) Elephant's wife
Who lent money to Tortoise? (a) Pig (b) Dog (c) Elephant
Where did pig seek money? (a) Tortoise's farm (b) Tortoise's house (c) Elephant's house
B: I _________ going to be seven next week. (am)
The pupils _________ in the assembly hall. (are not)
C: Explain the importance of verbal reasoning in language comprehension.
Discuss the role of context in understanding ambiguous words.
Analyze the impact of verbal reasoning on critical thinking skills.
